culinary_background: Grew up eating Gujarati home-cooked food in New Jersey with exposure to fusion and standard American cuisine. Vegetarian.
comfort_level: Intermediate — beyond just following recipes, comfortable in the kitchen but not yet an expert. Looking to go off-script more.
goals: Make weeknight dinners more interesting with unique variations on familiar Gujarati and vegetarian dishes. Learn to improvise and adapt when ingredients are limited. Expand repertoire beyond usual weekly rotation.
